translation.en: Got them completely covered.
I bet by the time this trip's over, you'll have blood all over your boots.
translation.es: Apuesto que cuando este viaje termine, tendrás sangre en tus botas.

translation.en: Nuh- uh. These are Timberlands.
You'll see.
I'll just turn this thing on now. There we go.
There we go. A bit for me.
translation.es: Eso es. Un poco para mí.

translation.en: - There we go. Thank you.  - A lot for Don.
translation.es: - Eso es. Gracias. - Mucho para Don.

translation.en: Little bit of whiskey for Jaden there. There you go.
translation.es: Un poco de whisky para Jaden. Aquí tienes.

translation.en: All right. A toast. To past victories and future success.
translation.es: Bien. Un brindis. Por victorias pasadas y éxitos futuros.

translation.en: To fathers and sons. And to that big old non- typical!
translation.es: Por los padres y los hijos. ¡Y por ese viejo no-típico!

translation.en: That burns more than scotch.
translation.es: Este quema más que el escocés.

translation.en: When have you ever had scotch?
Greg let me have a sip.
Scotch.
I like my whiskey American. Just like my cheese.
translation.es: A mí me gusta el whisky norteamericano. Como el queso.

translation.en: In all my world travels, I've had Swiss cheese, French Brie cheese,
translation.es: En mis viajes por el mundo, comí queso suizo, queso brie francés,

translation.en: every kind of cheese you can name.
translation.es: todo tipo de queso que se te ocurra.

translation.en: And I like processed American slices the best.
translation.es: Y me gusta el procesado, el mejor, el norteamericano en fetas.

translation.en: Kraft cheese melts the best. That's why I like it.
translation.es: El queso Kraft se derrite mejor. Por eso me gusta.

translation.en: I'm just not one who thinks it's better 'cause it's foreign.
translation.es: No soy de esos que creen que es mejor porque es extranjero.

translation.en: - Could I have some more? - Look out.
Jaden got himself a taste for the whiskey.
translation.es: A Jaden le gustó el whisky.

translation.en: Just a little bit, though. Just a little.
- You, too, Don? - Whoo- hoo!
He ain't gonna outdrink me.
translation.es: Él no beberá más que yo.

translation.en: All right. Here we go. One, two, three.
translation.es: Muy bien. Aquí vamos. Uno, dos, tres.

translation.en: Okay.
Damn. That was awesome. That was beautiful.
translation.es: Maldición. Eso fue increíble. Fue hermoso.

translation.en: What'd you think?
It's good. I had trouble following the story of the song,
translation.es: Es bueno. Tuve problemas para seguir la historia de la canción,

translation.en: but it was good. It was good.
- How long you been playing for? - Two years.
Two years. Wow, I had no idea.
- - Ah, hold up.
- It's Caroline. Dang. Hold on. -
- Everything all right? - It's fine.
Tell me about this girl you're dating.
translation.es: Cuéntame de esta chica con la que sales.

translation.en: - You go to the same school? - No. She's already in middle school.
translation.es: - ¿Van a la misma escuela? - No. Ella ya está en secundaria.

translation.en: Oh, middle school. Uh- oh, look out. Jaden's got himself an older woman.
translation.es: Secundaria. Cuidado. Jaden sale con una mujer mayor.

translation.en: No. Jaden got held back a year.
It's nothing to be ashamed of, right, son? It's all good.
translation.es: No hay que avergonzarse, ¿verdad, hijo? Todo está bien.

translation.en: Did I tell you I got a girlfriend?
Yes, I do. Her name's Kimberly.
I got a photograph of her here.
There she is. Ninety- eight pounds.
translation.es: Esa es ella. Cuarenta y cinco kilos.

translation.en: I call her my little spinner. Wanna know why?
translation.es: La llamo mi pequeño trompo. ¿Quieres saber por qué?

translation.en: Why?
Because I set her up on the tip of my pecker
translation.es: Porque la pongo en la punta de mi pito

translation.en: and spin her around like a spinning top.
translation.es: y la hago girar como un trompo.

translation.en: All right, Don. That's enough.
Oh, God, love her.
After this trip, me and her are gonna visit her folks in Kentucky. Phew.
translation.es: Después de este viaje, ella y yo visitaremos a su familia en Kentucky.

translation.en: They got it figured out. They got this beautiful land.
translation.es: Tienen todo resuelto. Tienen una tierra hermosa.

translation.en: Great big farm. All they do is sit around watching TV.
translation.es: Una granja inmensa. Solo se sientan a mirar TV.

translation.en: Don't they have a farm to run?
I guess. I ain't never seen them do it, though.
translation.es: Eso creo. Nunca los vi hacerlo.

translation.en: All I see them do is watch television.
That is gangster.
Sounds kind of boring to me.
Me and Kimberly like it, so it's not that boring to me.
translation.es: A Kimberly y a mí nos gusta, no me resulta aburrido.

translation.en: How about you, Dad? You got a girlfriend?
Who, Buck? The only tail your dad is chasing is whitetail.
translation.es: ¿Quién, Buck? La única cola que caza es la del cola blanca.

translation.en: Yeah. That's right.
Maybe you should start dating again.
No, no, no. I'm all right as is. I'm doing just fine.
translation.es: No, estoy bien así. Me va bien.

translation.en: Probably be good for you.
translation.es: Tal vez sería bueno para ti.

translation.en: Seems like Mom is moving on. Her and Greg are talking about getting married.
translation.es: Mamá siguió con su vida. Ella y Greg hablan de casarse.

translation.en: They're talking about what?
He hasn't officially asked her yet, but she knows it's coming.
translation.es: Aún no se lo pidió oficialmente, pero ella sabe que pasará.

translation.en: They talk about it all the time.
translation.es: Hablan de eso todo el tiempo.

translation.en: Shoot. That's ridiculous.
The ink on the divorce is barely even dry.
translation.es: La tinta del divorcio aún no se secó.

translation.en: It has been two years, Buck.
What are you, a human calendar?
Mr. Trapper Keeper? I know how long it's been.
translation.es: ¿El Sr. Agenda? Sé cuánto tiempo pasó.

translation.en: God! Shoot. I hate selfish people!
I'll give it to him, though.
Greg told me some of his ideas for when he proposes.
translation.es: Greg me contó algunas de sus ideas para cuando se declare.

translation.en: Man, that dude has a great imagination.
He was talking about all these crazy things like skydiving.
translation.es: Hablaba de cosas locas, como salto en caída libre.

translation.en: Where you going?
I'm gonna go take a leak.
Dang.
What were you thinking?
You know better than to pull a stunt like this.
You could have hurt yourself.
Sorry. Dang!
What is going on in your mind?
I just wanted to ride and y'all were asleep.
translation.es: Solo quería conducir, y ustedes estaban durmiendo.

translation.en: You realize I have to pay for that four- wheeler now?
translation.es: ¿Te das cuenta de que tendré que pagarlo ahora?

translation.en: - You realize how much they cost? -
Why are you recording?
This isn't part of the narrative.
translation.es: Esto no es parte de la narrativa.

translation.en: I figured it might make a good mid- point crisis--
translation.es: Pensé que sería una buena crisis de mitad...

translation.en: Shut the camera off.
Trying to have a moment with my son. Remove yourself.
translation.es: Quiero tener un momento con mi hijo. Desaparece.

translation.en: Yeah, okay.
This sucks. If you let me drive, then we wouldn't be in this predicament.
translation.es: Esto está mal. Si me dejaras conducir, no estaríamos en este problema.

translation.en: You shouldn't have taken out the four- wheeler without permission.
translation.es: No debiste llevarte el cuatriciclo sin permiso.

translation.en: Fine. I'm the devil. I'm a terrible person.
translation.es: Está bien. Soy el diablo. Una persona terrible.

translation.en: - Who are you calling? - Nobody.
Dang, I'm making a video for my vlog.
translation.es: Maldición. Hago un video para mi vlog.

translation.en: What's up? This is Jaden running around here,
translation.es: ¿Qué tal? Soy Jaden de recorrida por aquí,

translation.en: hunting in the woods with my dad.
translation.es: cazando en el bosque con mi papá.

translation.en: Sucks.
Leave me some comments if you hate hunting, too.
translation.es: Déjenme comentarios si también odian cazar.

translation.en: Give it.
What are you doing?
I told you one too many times to stay off the phone.
translation.es: Te dije muchas veces que dejaras en paz el teléfono.

translation.en: But that's my private property.
I'm keeping this until the end of the trip.
translation.es: Me lo guardaré hasta el final del viaje.

translation.en: For the next few days, you have to go without it.
translation.es: Durante los próximos días, te arreglarás sin él.

translation.en: What about Caroline?
The world isn't gonna end if you can't call your girlfriend for three days.
translation.es: El mundo no acabará si no llamas a tu novia en tres días.

translation.en: But we're each other's support system.
translation.es: Somos el sistema de apoyo uno del otro.

translation.en: The cell phone is mine. Topic closed.
translation.es: El celular es mío. Se terminó la discusión.

translation.en: You're ruining my life and you don't even care.
translation.es: Estás arruinando mi vida, y ni siquiera te importa.

translation.en: Maybe I'm ruining your life 'cause you're being a damn idiot.
translation.es: Quizá arruino tu vida porque te comportas como un idiota.

translation.en: Don't call me an idiot!
- Okay. - Take it back.
I take it back. It's not like I meant it.
translation.es: Retiro lo dicho. No quise decirlo.

translation.en: Let's forget about it.
Now what about that non- typical we saw yesterday?
translation.es: ¿Qué hay del no-típico que vimos ayer?

translation.en: How'd you like to bag that son of a gun, huh?
translation.es: ¿Te gustaría matar a ese hijo de perra?

translation.en: Come on, we're hunting. Let's have fun.
I can't stand you sometimes.
I see you peeking out from behind that tree.
translation.es: Sé que estás espiando desde atrás de ese árbol.

translation.en: This is not going in the cut.
translation.es: Eso no irá en la edición final.

translation.en: After experiencing some technical difficulties
with one of our four- wheelers,
we decided to go on foot.
Nothing was gonna keep Jaden and me from catching that monster non- typical.
translation.es: Nada impediría que Jaden y yo atrapáramos a ese no-típico.

translation.en: When things don't go right, a true hunter straps on his boots and marches on.
translation.es: Cuando las cosas no van bien, el cazador ajusta sus botas y continúa.

translation.en: Just when we thought we'd lost the trail,
translation.es: Cuando pensamos que habíamos perdido el rastro,

translation.en: I noticed a whole mess of tracks by the river.
translation.es: noté unas pisadas junto al río.

translation.en: This was a good sign.
It looked like a well- traveled doe trail, and like every hunter knows,
translation.es: Parecía rastro de hembra bien transitado, y como todo cazador sabe,

translation.en: where there's a doe, a buck is not far behind.
translation.es: donde hay una hembra, hay un ciervo no muy lejos.

translation.en: I showed Jaden how the doe trail followed up the river.
translation.es: Le mostré a Jaden cómo subía por el río el rastro de la hembra.

translation.en: Our non- typical was leading us even deeper into the mountains,
translation.es: Nuestro no-típico nos llevaba más adentro en las montañas,

translation.en: miles away from human contact.
translation.es: a mucha distancia del contacto humano.

translation.en: Almost as if it was calling us.
translation.es: Casi como si nos estuviera llamando.

translation.en: Just like life, hunting comes with no guarantees.
translation.es: Como la vida, la cacería no viene con garantías.

translation.en: But I don't usually have a problem finding the big deer,
translation.es: Pero usualmente no tengo problemas en encontrar ciervos grandes,

translation.en: especially with that old Sniper 2000 stuff I use.
translation.es: en especial con la vieja Sniper 2000 que uso.

translation.en: That's what I'm talking about.
translation.es: De eso es lo que hablo.

translation.en: It's like he doesn't even care about catching this deer.
translation.es: Es como si no le importara cazar este ciervo.

translation.en: This trip was supposed to be a way for us to bond.
translation.es: Se supone que este viaje era para unirnos.

translation.en: Yeah, well, it doesn't look like that's happening.
translation.es: Me parece que eso no está sucediendo.

translation.en: - Jesus, Don. - What? I'm agreeing with you.
translation.es: - Cielos, Don. - ¿Qué? Estoy de acuerdo contigo.

translation.en: It doesn't look like it's happening.
- Yeah, well, stop. - Okay. Copy that.
translation.es: - Sí, bueno, basta. - De acuerdo. Entendido.

translation.en: I was hoping to discuss something with you, if you don't mind.
translation.es: Esperaba poder hablar de algo contigo, si no te molesta.

translation.en: Yeah, what?
Well, I was thinking maybe after this trip I go ahead and take a little time off.
translation.es: Pensaba que quizá después de este viaje me tomaré un tiempo libre.

translation.en: What? Time off?
Yeah, you know, I told you about Kimberly's parents' farm.
translation.es: Sí, ya sabes. Te conté de la granja de la familia de Kimberly.

translation.en: We were thinking maybe going up there,
spend a little time, uh, hang out there. See how it fits us.
translation.es: pasar algún tiempo. Ver cómo nos va eso.

translation.en: But we got Washington next month.
translation.es: Pero tenemos Washington el próximo mes.

translation.en: That's the thing. I was thinking maybe you go up alone and I sit this one out.
translation.es: De eso se trata. Quizá podrías ir tú solo y yo me lo saltearía.

translation.en: But we gotta shoot Buck Ferguson Takes On the Great Northwest.
translation.es: Pero debemos filmar Buck Ferguson conquista el gran Noroeste.

translation.en: Well, Buck, to be honest,
Kimberly's getting sick of me leaving all the time.
translation.es: Kimberly está harta de que me vaya todo el tiempo.

translation.en: She's throwing around the R word.
translation.es: Siempre está hablando de la palabra con J.

translation.en: What's that word?
Retirement. She thinks I should be retiring.
I can't believe you're choosing now to bring this up.
translation.es: No puedo creer que elijas este momento para mencionar esto.

translation.en: Don't you think I got enough to worry about with Jaden?
translation.es: ¿No tengo ya bastante de qué preocuparme con Jaden?

translation.en: Yeah, of course I do.
Look, you and me have done things the world is gonna remember.
translation.es: Mira, tú y yo hicimos cosas que el mundo recordará.

translation.en: I've done them, but you videotaped me doing them.
translation.es: Las hice yo, pero tú las filmaste.

translation.en: You wanna throw that all away?
translation.es: ¿Quieres echar todo eso por la borda?

translation.en: No, Buck. I never said I want to throw them away. I...
translation.es: No, Buck, no dije que quería echar todo por la borda. Yo...

translation.en: This isn't really that thought out of an idea.
translation.es: Es una idea que no tengo totalmente elaborada.

translation.en: It was just something she was pushing on me.
translation.es: Es algo que ella me empuja a hacer.

translation.en: I'm sorry, but I can't allow it.
translation.es: Lo siento, pero no puedo permitirlo.

translation.en: Your dream of watching TV all day long is gonna have to wait.
translation.es: Tu sueño de mirar TV todo el día tendrá que esperar.

translation.en: I need all hands on deck right now.
translation.es: Necesito toda la ayuda que pueda tener.

translation.en: Yeah. No. Of course you do.
We're in the middle of it, so, yeah.
translation.es: Estamos a mitad de esto, claro.

translation.en: Maybe we can agree to discuss this at a later date.
translation.es: Quizá podemos discutirlo en otro momento.

translation.en: - How about that? - Yeah. I don't know, Don.
translation.es: - ¿Qué te parece? - Sí. No lo sé, Don.

translation.en: Maybe in a year or so. But probably not.
translation.es: Quizá en un año, o algo así. Pero probablemente no.

translation.en: Sounds good. Just forget I even said anything about it.
translation.es: Suena bien. Olvida que te dije algo.

translation.en: Hey, look what I found.
Keep moving.
Be careful. You're gonna hurt yourself.
I'm not. I'm trained for this. Greg set me up with parkour lessons.
translation.es: No. Estoy entrenado para esto. Greg me pagó clases de parkour.

translation.en: I thought you were taking karate. We agreed on karate.
translation.es: Pensé que aprendías karate. Fue lo que acordamos.

translation.en: It was too hard, so I quit.
translation.es: Era muy difícil, así que abandoné.

translation.en: Well, it takes time to learn something, son.
You can't just go around quitting stuff 'cause it's hard.
translation.es: No puedes abandonar todo porque es difícil.

translation.en: That's not what Greg says.
translation.es: No es lo que dice Greg.

translation.en: Greg says if you don't like doing something,
translation.es: Greg dice que si no te gusta hacer algo,

translation.en: there ain't no reason to do it. And it's totally cool to quit.
translation.es: no hay razón para hacerlo. Y está bien abandonarlo.

translation.en: Well, that's a terrible lesson. No wonder you got held back.
translation.es: Qué lección terrible. Ahora entiendo por qué repetiste.

translation.en: Greg says it was the teacher's fault.
translation.es: Greg dice que la culpa es del maestro.

translation.en: Greg's only telling you what you wanna hear
translation.es: Greg te dice lo que quieres oír

translation.en: because he wants to suck up and not hurt your feelings.
translation.es: para quedar bien contigo y no herir tus sentimientos.

translation.en: Trust me when I tell you that when you get a little older,
translation.es: Créeme cuando te digo que cuando seas más grande,

translation.en: you won't think gymnastics are cool anymore.
translation.es: pensarás que la gimnasia no es tan genial.

translation.en: I told you, it's not gymnastics, it's parkour--
translation.es: Ya te lo dije, no es gimnasia, es parkour...

translation.en: Oh, you're okay.
No, I'm not. My leg's getting ready to seize up on me.
translation.es: No lo estoy. La pierna está empezando a molestarme.

translation.en: That's why I told you stop playing around on the rocks. Get up.
translation.es: Por eso te dije que dejaras de jugar en las rocas. Arriba.

translation.en: Let me catch my breath for a second.
- Is your leg hurting or are you tired? - Both. Dang.
translation.es: - ¿Te duele la pierna o estás cansado? - Las dos. Maldición.

translation.en: Okay, we lost the whole morning already.
- Daylight's burning here. - But, Dad, my leg's fixing to die.
translation.es: - Estamos desperdiciando la luz del día. - Papá, mi pierna me está matando.

translation.en: Oh, you shit bird!
You all right, Don?
I slipped on this damn rock and hit my darn head.
translation.es: Me resbalé en la roca y me golpeé la cabeza.

translation.en: Maybe it is a good time to stop for lunch.
translation.es: Quizá es buen momento para almorzar.

translation.en: Yeah, let's make camp. Sounds like a good idea.
translation.es: Sí, acampemos. Es una buena idea.

translation.en: Good, 'cause my blood sugar's running low.
translation.es: Bien, porque me está bajando el azúcar.

translation.en: Oh, shit, am I bleeding?
Hey, Jaden, where's your daddy?
- Making sandwiches. - You ain't hungry?
I am hungry. But I'm gonna put my hunger pangs into my music.
translation.es: Sí. Pero usaré mis punzadas de hambre para mi música.

translation.en: Oh, uh- oh. What's wrong?
I could tell you, but you would never understand.
translation.es: Te lo diría, pero no lo entenderías.

translation.en: Oh, you might be surprised what old Don understands.
translation.es: Te sorprendería saber lo que entiende Don.

translation.en: - - You smoke?
Hell, yeah, I do. Don't tell your dad, though.
translation.es: Diablos, sí. No le cuentes a tu papá.

translation.en: Thinks it scares away the deer.
translation.es: Cree que ahuyenta a los ciervos.

translation.en: Can I get a toke?
There you go, Biggin.
I wish my dad was more chill like you.
translation.es: Ojalá mi papá fuera así de genial como tú.

translation.en: Your dad is definitely not the easiest fella to get along with.
translation.es: Tu papá no es el tipo más fácil para congeniar.

translation.en: He does put a lot of pressure on himself.
I think that's his drive to become the world's best hunter.
translation.es: Creo que es su deseo de ser el mejor cazador del mundo.

translation.en: I can remember the first video I made with your dad.
translation.es: Recuerdo el primer video que hice con tu papá.

translation.en: We were up in Michigan, and I was not prepared for the weather.
translation.es: Estábamos en Michigan, y yo no estaba preparado para el clima.

translation.en: That first day it had snowed ten inches and I'd forgotten my waterproof boots.
translation.es: El primer día había nevado 25 cm, y yo no tenía botas impermeables.

translation.en: I turned to your dad and said,
translation.es: Miré a tu papá y le dije:

translation.en: Please, Buck, let's turn back. Let's go home. Let's get out of here.
translation.es: Por favor, Buck, regresemos. Volvamos a casa. Salgamos de aquí.

translation.en: But he wasn't hearing it.
He sat me down. He was like,
Don, do you know what kind of pressure I'm under? Do you?
translation.es: Don, ¿quieres saber bajo cuánta presión estoy? ¿Eso quieres?

translation.en: Every single person thinks
that Buck Ferguson gets his deer every single time,
translation.es: que Buck Ferguson siempre caza un ciervo,

translation.en: and I won't turn back until I do.
- What'd you do? - What do you think I did?
Sucked it up.
We stayed out there for another three days and damn if your dad wasn't right.
translation.es: Me quedé ahí otros tres días, y tu papá tuvo razón.

translation.en: He caught himself a nice 12 pointer,
and we made one of the best videos we've ever made.
translation.es: e hicimos uno de los mejores videos que hayamos filmado.

translation.en: What about your feet?
I lost my big toe to frostbite.
translation.es: Perdí un dedo gordo por la congelación.

translation.en: You lost a toe?
Yes, I did. Yep.
Got a little bit of a balance issue because of it.
translation.es: Tengo un problema de equilibrio por eso.

translation.en: That's not really the takeaway.
The point of the story is your dad is under a lot of pressure.
translation.es: El punto de la historia es que tu papá está bajo mucha presión.

translation.en: You can understand being under pressure, right?
I guess.
Don, why does my dad hate me?
translation.es: Don, ¿por qué me odia mi papá?

translation.en: Hate you?
Oh, come on. You don't believe that.
Your dad is tough to get along with, but he loves you.
translation.es: Tu papá es difícil para congeniar, pero te quiere.

translation.en: These last two years have just been tough on him.
translation.es: Estos dos últimos años fueron difíciles para él.

translation.en: That divorce did a real number on his head.
I think he believes this trip is gonna somehow fix it.
translation.es: Pienso que él cree que este viaje arreglará eso, de algún modo.

translation.en: Well, I wish he'd care less about me killing a deer
translation.es: Ojalá se ocupara menos de que yo mate un ciervo

translation.en: and more about giving me back my dang phone.
translation.es: y más de devolverme mi maldito teléfono.

translation.en: Caroline's probably worried sick.
I can relate to that.
If I don't call Kimberly every now and then,
translation.es: Si no llamo a Kimberly de vez en cuando,

translation.en: she definitely puts my ass in the damn doghouse.
I wish there was some way I could let her know I'm okay.
translation.es: Ojalá hubiera una forma de decirle que estoy bien.

translation.en: That's all I want for her right now.
translation.es: Es todo lo que quiero ahora mismo.

translation.en: - You ready, buddy? - I'm ready.
- Are you filming? Is it rolling? - Yeah.
Here we go. Hoverboard city.
translation.es: Aquí vamos. Por arriba de la ciudad.

translation.en: - Don't be scared. - I ain't scared.
translation.es: - No te asustes. - No estoy asustado.

translation.en: Just don't wanna break my neck. Thanks for the ride, buddy!
translation.es: Pero no quiero quebrarme el cuello. ¡Gracias por el paseo, amigo!

translation.en: Hey, Buck, what you doing? What you up to?
Just looking for the shortest course to the top of this mountain.
translation.es: Busco el camino más corto a la cima de la montaña.

translation.en: Oh, that's great.
Lunch is gonna get cold. Where's Jaden?
translation.es: Se enfriará el almuerzo. ¿Dónde está Jaden?

translation.en: Don, look at me. Where's my son?
He's, uh, talking with his girlfriend.
No, he's not. I took his phone away.
translation.es: No. Yo le quité el teléfono.

translation.en: I let him borrow mine. So he's...
translation.es: Le presté el mío. Así que...

translation.en: - You did what? - I let him borrow my phone.
It was the right thing to do. He really wanted to speak with her.
translation.es: Era lo correcto. Realmente quería hablar con ella.

translation.en: I took that away from him so he'd focus on this trip.
translation.es: Se lo quité para que se concentrara en el viaje.

translation.en: How could you do that?
I guess I'm just a believer in true love.
translation.es: Me parece que creo en el amor verdadero.

translation.en: He is really torn up about this girl and I didn't think it was right--
translation.es: Está angustiado por esta chica, y pensé que no estaba bien...

translation.en: Don! Stop it! I'm his father.
I know what's best for him, and I'd take it kindly
